languages.text: "Последний раунд должен быть особенным — стреляем по бутылке на голове блюстителя".
"The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."
languages.original_text: "Последний раунд должен быть особенным — стреляем по бутылке на голове блюстителя".

traits.locale_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."
"The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

"The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

languages.text: 「最後のラウンドは派手に行こうぜ！執行官の頭の上のボトルを撃つんだ」
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: 「最後のラウンドは派手に行こうぜ！執行官の頭の上のボトルを撃つんだ」

languages.text: "Son turun özel olması gerek. Şişeyi bir infazcının başına koyup öyle vuralım."
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: "Son turun özel olması gerek. Şişeyi bir infazcının başına koyup öyle vuralım."

languages.text: «La última ronda tiene que ser especial... disparemos a una botella sobre la cabeza de un guardia».
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: «La última ronda tiene que ser especial... disparemos a una botella sobre la cabeza de un guardia».

languages.text: “最后这轮得来点新花样，不如把瓶子摆在那个执法者脑袋上吧。”
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: “最后这轮得来点新花样，不如把瓶子摆在那个执法者脑袋上吧。”

languages.text: « La dernière manche doit se démarquer des autres... Je propose que nous tirions sur une bouteille posée sur la tête d'un prévôt. »
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: « La dernière manche doit se démarquer des autres... Je propose que nous tirions sur une bouteille posée sur la tête d'un prévôt. »

languages.text: "Die letzte Runde muss etwas Besonderes sein ... wir schießen eine Flasche vom Kopf eines Enforcers."
languages.original_text: "The last round needs to be special — shooting a bottle on top of an enforcer's head."

traits.locale_text: "Die letzte Runde muss etwas Besonderes sein ... wir schießen eine Flasche vom Kopf eines Enforcers."
